name: Coaching Shift - Scene 4
description: Behind the Scenes of ConnecTeen - Room 4 - Follow all procedures and get set up (technology) for your first shift
hints: I wrote down a note for myself somewhere...
Oh found it, its on the table beside my bottle. It reads "Take care of yourself".
In order to solve this room, you need to know a way to take care of yourself. Another way to say this is "self care". The correct answer to the puzzle is "self care".
